title: Querying the Database
description: It's time to start querying data from the database! For this, we create a new HTTP GET request route, make the request with the fetch() function, and search the database with find().

timestamps.title: Code! Request all entries from the server!
Code! Display the entries on the webpage!

codeExamples.title: Querying the Database
codeExamples.description: Demonstration of querying the database and listing all entries in the DOM.

links.title: NeDB
